title: I’m a Villainess but the Capture Target is too Abnormal - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Awkward Protagonist   Betrayal   Depictions of Cruelty   Doting Parents   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Otome Game   Possessive Characters   R-15   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reverse Harem   Transmigration   Unrequited Love   Villainess Noble Girls   Yandere

description: Having remembered her past life and realizing that she had reincarnated into the world of an otome game, Mistia Arlen desperately tried to save herself from a dead-end, but in the process ended up screwing something even more important up...>
